definitions: To slide unintentionally for a short distance.
To move smoothly, easily, or stealthily.
To pass out of one's memory or attention.
To put on or take off (clothing) quickly and easily.
To make a mistake or error.
examples: She might slip on the ice.
The cat tried to slip through the door.
He will slip into his jacket.
I hope I don't slip up on this test.
